issue.title: [CF 623] Highlight Timer Edge
issue.body:
In earlier versions, there used to be an option to highlight the timer edge so that it would be easier to see. Is there a chance it can be brought back?

Thanks.


> Posted by CurseForge user amoeba3 | Imported from CurseForge issue #623 | Raw

comments.body:
It was removed by Blizzard (the highlight is now used to show the cooldown of spells with charges that are not completely depleted), so no, not possible.

Edited Sep 16, 2012

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
